::Lavatron::

Lavatron moves to the side, but the clunk hits him on the shoulder,
though since he didn't have an arm on that side, it doesn't do too
much damage. He sends another shock through Surgital, keeping a tight
grip on the other's arm.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> ::Surgital::
> 
>      Surgital used his free arm to cover his eyes from the blast of
his missile.  He still struggled to release his arm from Lavatron's
gasp.  Surgital took his free arm, and clenched it into a fist, then
attempted to clunk Lavatron on the top of the head.
> 
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Yanshosh@a... 
>   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   Sent: Friday, April 27, 2001 5:05 PM
>   Subject: Re: Gestalts
> 
> 
>   ::Lavatron::
> 
>   The missile hits Lavatron, jerking him back, but he doesn't let go
of 
>   the arm.
> 
> 
> 
>   --- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
>   > ::Surgital::
>   > 
>   >      Surgital felt electricity run through hkm and cause more
pain.
>   > 
>   >      "Aghh!" he cried.
>   > 
>   >      Surgital's shoulder opened up to reveal a missile
launcher.  He 
>   shot a missile at Lavatron, but if it hit, it would affect himself
too 
>   because he was using a ranged missile in melee combat.
>
